name: Galaxa Gems
description:
Simply tap the screen to rotate the cube and match the color with the falling gems! It may seem simple at first, but beware, those gems get quicker and quicker the higher your score climbs.

Every point you earn is a gem that you can put towards buying extra lives, so you can pick up where you left off and go for that next high score!

Don't let your friends have a higher score than you, use those extra lives to zip right past them. Try it now!
